headline: USRT: Hold For Resilient Returns In A Volatile REIT Market
summary: USRT ETF is rated as a hold. Read more on its diversified exposure, low volatility, and resilience, yet limited growth appeal amidst high-rate environment.

headline: Simon Property Group Posts Strong Q2 Amid Mixed Analyst Opinions
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) is one of the 12 Best REIT Stocks to Buy Right Now. Analysts express conflicting sentiments amid the announcement of strong Q2 earnings results.
